Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.ra

Interface EndEntityAccessSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EndEntityAccessSessionLocal, EndEntityAccessSessionRemote
    public interface EndEntityAccessSession
    Provides find methods for EndEntityInformation objects.
    Version:
    $Id: EndEntityAccessSession.java 29301 2018-06-21 10:27:38Z andresjakobs $

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • findUser

        EndEntityInformation findUser​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                              String username)
                       throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Finds a user by username.
        Parameters:
        admin - the administrator performing the action
        username - user
        Returns:
        EndEntityInformation or null if the user is not found.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if the admin was not authorized to the end entity profile or issuing CA

      • findUserBySubjectAndIssuerDN

        List<EndEntityInformation> findUserBySubjectAndIssuerDN​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                        String subjectdn,
                                                        String issuerdn)
                                                 throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Find users by their subject and issuer DN.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        subjectdn - DN
        issuerdn - DN
        Returns:
        A list of all EndEntityInformations found matching those DNs, or an empty list
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail

      • findUserBySubjectDN

        List<EndEntityInformation> findUserBySubjectDN​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                               String subjectdn)
                                        throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Find users by their subject DN.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        subjectdn - DN
        Returns:
        A list of all EndEntityInformations matching the given DN, or an empty list
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if the admin was not authorized to the end entity profile or issuing CA

      • findUserByEmail

        List<EndEntityInformation> findUserByEmail​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                           String email)
                                    throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Finds a users by subject email.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        email - email
        Returns:
        List of all matching EndEntityInformation, never null
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if the admin was not authorized to the end entity profile or issuing CA

      • findAllUsersByStatus

        Collection<EndEntityInformation> findAllUsersByStatus​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                      int status)
        Finds all users with a specified status.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        status - the status to look for, from 'UserData'.
        Returns:
        Collection of EndEntityInformation

      • findAllUsersByCaId

        Collection<EndEntityInformation> findAllUsersByCaId​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                    int caid)
        Finds all users registered to a specified CA.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        caid - the caid of the CA, from 'UserData'.
        Returns:
        Collection of EndEntityInformation, or empty collection if the query is illegal or no users exist

      • findAllBatchUsersByStatusWithLimit

        List<EndEntityInformation> findAllBatchUsersByStatusWithLimit​(int status)
        Finds all batch users with a specified status. Limited by the maximum query count define in the global configuration.
        Parameters:
        status - the status, from 'UserData'.
        Returns:
        all EndEntityInformation objects or an empty list

      • query

        Collection<EndEntityInformation> query​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                       Query query,
                                       String caauthorizationstring,
                                       String endentityprofilestring,
                                       int numberofrows,
                                       String endentityAccessRule)
                                throws IllegalQueryException
        Method to execute a customized query on the ra user data. The parameter query should be a legal Query object.
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        query - a number of statements compiled by query class to a SQL 'WHERE'-clause statement.
        caauthorizationstring - is a string placed in the where clause of SQL query indication which CA:s the administrator is authorized to view.
        endentityprofilestring - is a string placed in the where clause of SQL query indication which endentityprofiles the administrator is authorized to view.
        numberofrows - the number of rows to fetch, use 0 for the maximum query count define in the global configuration.
        endentityAccessRule - The end entity access rule that is necessary to execute the query
        Returns:
        a collection of EndEntityInformation.
        Throws:
        IllegalQueryException - when query parameters internal rules isn't fulfilled.
        See Also:
        Query

      • findCertificatesByUsername

        Collection<CertificateWrapper> findCertificatesByUsername​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                                          String username,
                                                          boolean onlyValid,
                                                          long now)
                                                   throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                                          CertificateEncodingException
        Retrieves a collection of certificates as byte array generated for a user. Authorization requirements:
         - /administrator
 - /ra_functionality/view_end_entity
 - /endentityprofilesrules/<end entity profile>/view_end_entity
 - /ca/<ca of user>
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - admin
        username - a unique username.
        onlyValid - only return valid certificates not revoked or expired ones.
        now - the current time as long value since epoch.
        Returns:
        a collection of certificate wrappers or an empty list if no certificates, or no user, could be found.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if client isn't authorized to request.
        CertificateEncodingException - if a certificate could not be encoded.

      • getCertificate

        CertificateWrapper getCertificate​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                  String certSNinHex,
                                  String issuerDN)
                           throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                  CADoesntExistsException,
                                  EjbcaException
        Fetches an issued certificate. Authorization requirements:
         - A valid certificate
 - /ca_functionality/view_certificate
 - /ca/<of the issing CA>
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - the administrator performing the action.
        certSNinHex - the certificate serial number in hexadecimal representation.
        issuerDN - the issuer of the certificate.
        Returns:
        the certificate wrapper or null if certificate couldn't be found.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if the calling administrator isn't authorized to view the certificate.
        CADoesntExistsException - if a referenced CA does not exist.
        EjbcaException - any EjbcaException.
